A simulation of the Monty Hall Problem.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}

simulation <- crossing(trial = 1:1e6) %>%
  mutate(door_1 = 0,
         door_2 = 0,
         door_3 = 0,
         select = sample(3, n(), TRUE),
         switch = if_else(select == 2, "LOSE", "WIN"))

simulation %>%
  summarise(mean(switch == "WIN"))

```
